sn55.19:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—jetavane antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
sn55.19:1.3: Atha kho sambahulā tāvatiṃsakāyikā devatāyo yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā devatāyo āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn55.19:2.1: “Sādhu kho, āvuso, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
sn55.19:2.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.19:2.3: Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
sn55.19:2.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.19:2.7: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, āvuso, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
sn55.19:3.1: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṃ hoti—
sn55.19:3.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.19:3.3: Buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
sn55.19:3.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṃ hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
sn55.19:3.7: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanahetu kho, mārisa moggallāna, evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā”ti.
